component.name: WebServers
component.option:
<webServer id="web-server-id-" name="" url="http://127.0.0.1"> <fileTransfer host="127.0.0.1" port="" privateKey="$PROJECT_DIR$/.vagrant/machines//virtualbox/private_key" accessType="SFTP" username="vagrant" keyPair="true">
<option name="port" value="" />
